scripts.start: python jsonfy.py ./assets && budo src/main.js:bundle.js --live -- -d -e src/main.js -t [babelify --comments false --presets es2015]
scripts.build: npm run build:js && npm run build:css && npm run build:html && npm run copy:all
scripts.build:js: browserify -d -e src/main.js -t [babelify --comments false --presets es2015] | uglifyjs -cm > build/bundle.min.js
scripts.copy:all: npm run copy:assets && npm run copy:phaser && npm run copy:libs
scripts.copy:assets: ncp assets build/assets/ && python jsonfy.py assets/ && cp assets.json build/
